## Allow Movement During Cutscenes [mkwcat]

Allows player inputs during certain types of cutscenes. May cause softlocks
and/or unintended side effects depending on how it's used.

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Many revisions may be untested.

<details>
<summary>PAL Rev 1</summary>

```hex
0405E0A8 48000020
0405E16C 48000014
C205E1B8 0000000D
A09F0012 548007FF
40820058 54800631
41820050 A0BF000C
A0DF000E 7CA53378
A0DF0004 7CA03378
B01F0004 7CA53078
A0DF0006 7CA03378
B01F0006 548005EF
40820020 A0BF0010
88DF0018 88FF0019
7CC62B78 7CE72B78
98DF0018 98FF0019
881F0015 60000000
```
</details>
